code: import React from'react';import{Map,Marker,InfoWindow}from'@vis.gl/react-google-maps';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const parseLocation=location=>{const match=location.match(/POINT \(([-\d.]+) ([-\d.]+)\)/);console.log("natch",match);if(match){return{lng:parseFloat(match[1]),lat:parseFloat(match[2])};}return null;};const LocateMap=_ref=>{let{data}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"map-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Map,{style:{borderRadius:"20px"},defaultZoom:13,gestureHandling:"greedy",children:data.map((item,index)=>{const coords=parseLocation(item["VehicleLocation"]);return coords&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Marker,{position:coords,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(InfoWindow,{children:[item.Make," ",item.Model," - ",item.City,", ",item.State]})},index);})})});};export default LocateMap;
